name: Claws of Life
description: Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing 2249 Disease Damage and an additional 2245 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  You are healed for 100% of the damage over time caused.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
effectLines: The damage over time heals you for its damage caused.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing $1 Disease Damage and an additional $2 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  You are healed for 100% of the damage over time caused.  Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
rawDescription:
Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing <<1>> and an additional <<2>> over <<3>>. You are healed for <<4>> of the damage over time caused.

Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
